title: Lost TV/Cable/BDP remote control app
summary: 7 day trial with universal IR/Wi-Fi support
description: MyAV is a TV remote control app; perfect if you've lost your remote.Works over Wi-Fi for certain Smart TVs: Sony, Panasonic, Samsung, Sharp  & LG and even more makes of TVs if your device has an infrared (IR) blaster.Additionally, MyAV can also control a range of other products. Other controllable devices include Blu-ray players, set-top boxes, cable & sat and home cinema receivers.Dish, Roku, Xfinity, DirecTV, Sky+HD (UK) If you have IR on your Android device then this app can control even more devices.A full compatibility list can be found on our site:http://myav.co.uk/compatiblity.htmThis is a free 7 day trial version of the main MyAV app
descriptionHTML:
MyAV is a TV remote control app; perfect if you've lost your remote.
Works over Wi-Fi for certain Smart TVs: Sony, Panasonic, Samsung, Sharp & LG and even more makes of TVs if your device has an infrared (IR) blaster.

Additionally, MyAV can also control a range of other products. Other controllable devices include Blu-ray players, set-top boxes, cable & sat and home cinema receivers.
Dish, Roku, Xfinity, DirecTV, Sky+HD (UK)

If you have IR on your Android device then this app can control even more devices.

A full compatibility list can be found on our site:
http://myav.co.uk/compatiblity.htm

This is a free 7 day trial version of the main MyAV app
comments: Worked great then last few days won't work so pissed off no remote now
Have paid the subscription fee for three months and has now stopped working. Telling me to buy again for 5.99 why?
It wont work on my Panasonic blu-ray player i need ansers
Can't pick other device Locked on a Roku in another room
recentChanges: Support for Sky Pro & Sky HD (Cable) Germany
